column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Holly - Thank you for your review. May I ask what date and time you dined with us? And in which section of the restaurant you were seated? I'd like to find out who your server was
column2: and why he behaved in a manner unbecoming of our staff. To that end
column3: could you provide a little more detail (via private message if you like) on his behavior so I can discuss it with him?
